TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlReader extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary:
Represents a reader that provides fast, noncached, forward-only access to XML data.
To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System.Xml/Xml/System/Xml/Core/XmlReader.cs#086471e5cca0825f).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Xml.XmlNodeType MoveToContent ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Xml.XmlNodeType MoveToContent() cil managed

Docs.summary: Checks whether the current node is a content (non-white space text, `CDATA`, `Element`, `EndElement`, `EntityReference`, or `EndEntity`) node. If the node is not a content node, the reader skips ahead to the next content node or end of file. It skips over nodes of the following type: `ProcessingInstruction`, `DocumentType`, `Comment`, `Whitespace`, or `SignificantWhitespace`.
